General.Name: Hubei TKD Crystal Electn
General.Description: TKD Science and Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells quartz frequency control components and production equipment in primarily China. The company's main products include Quartz Crystal Oscillators; SMD quartz crystal; and thermistor quartz crystal, as well as DIP tuning fork, quartz crystal resonators, SMD high-frequency crystal resonators, upstream chip, WAFER, pedestal, shell, etc. Its products are used in information devices, mobile terminals, network equipment, automotive electronics, consumer electronics, small electronic devices, etc. The company was formerly known as Hubei TKD Crystal Electronic Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to TKD Science And Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2019. TKD Science And Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Suizhou, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xiaohui  Huang
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
